file_content.text: [This appears to be a recording left by one of Master Rajivari's apprentices.]
Master Rajivari's gone. The Council survived--we failed. They'll come for us.
They'll have to lay siege if they want to take us prisoner. We can't give in.
Master Rajivari's fifth principle says showing mercy to an enemy creates a spiral of destruction. We'll take plenty of Jedi with us.
